titles.title: Strengthening Buy America for Small Shipyard Grants Act
Strengthening Buy America for Small Shipyard Grants Act
A bill to ensure small shipyard grant projects are carried out using materials produced in the United States.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Strengthening Buy America for Small Shipyard Grants Act
This bill requires that grants awarded through the Maritime Administration's small shipyard grant program must be used for projects that are carried out using materials produced or manufactured in the United States, with specified exceptions.
